Label.en: It's telling that Eiffel was also strongly involved in the construction of the Statue of Liberty in New York, too!
Label.fr: Dans le même état d'esprit, Eiffel a aussi largement participé à la construction de la Statue de la Liberté pour l'Etat de New York !
Label.es: It's telling that Eiffel was also strongly involved in the construction of the Statue of Liberty in New York, too!
Label.zh: It's telling that Eiffel was also strongly involved in the construction of the Statue of Liberty in New York, too!

Label.en: As well as being responsible for huge developments in wind resistance technology...
Label.fr: Ensuite il a pas mal travaillé sur l'aérodynamique, la radio et la méteo... notamment pour sauver sa tour de la destruction
Label.es: As well as being responsible for huge developments in wind resistance technology...
Label.zh: As well as being responsible for huge developments in wind resistance technology...

Label.en: So, what do you think? Was he an arrogant megalomaniac or a man of the people?
Label.fr: Qu'en penses-tu ? Mégalomane arrogant ou ami du peuple ?
Label.es: So, what do you think? Was he an arrogant megalomaniac or a man of the people?
Label.zh: So, what do you think? Was he an arrogant megalomaniac or a man of the people?

Label.en: Anyway, despite all these hiccups, the Eiffel tower was completed and has remained until this day...
Label.fr: Quoi qu'il en soit, la tour Eiffel trône toujours fièrement sur Paris
Label.es: Anyway, despite all these hiccups, the Eiffel tower was completed and has remained until this day...
Label.zh: Anyway, despite all these hiccups, the Eiffel tower was completed and has remained until this day...

Label.fr: Une vraie success story pour ce trône de fer !

Label.en: Anyway, despite all these hiccups, the Eiffel tower was completed and has remained until this day...
Label.fr: Quoi qu'il en soit, la tour Eiffel trône toujours fièrement sur Paris...
Label.es: Anyway, despite all these hiccups, the Eiffel tower was completed and has remained until this day...
Label.zh: Anyway, despite all these hiccups, the Eiffel tower was completed and has remained until this day...

Label.fr: Une vraie success story pour ce trône de fer !
